content.question: Which of the following best describes the value printed as a result of executing the code segment?

choices.label: The sum of all the elements in intList
The number of elements in intList
The number of even values in intList
The number of elements in even-numbered indexes in intList

content.answer: The number of elements in even-numbered indexes in intList

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
